backend/main.mo: Actor defining storage, access control, and data models for episodes, characters, clans, gallery items, news, scripts, pro blocks, fan mail, collaborations, and support requests.
feature_evidence.json: Structured feature evidence report mapping feature IDs to related files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-like text listing human-written summaries for various frontend files and components.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining color variables, dark mode values, and global background/text styling.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point loading the root div and main.tsx module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app component handling hash-based routing for main, admin, pro, and secret views and rendering all site sections.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminAcces: Component gating admin access using Internet Identity and admin checks, showing login, unauthorized, or dashboard states.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminDashb: Provides the admin dashboard layout with tab navigation linking to all content management panels.
frontend/src/components/admin/panels/Cha: Implements CRUD management for characters, including metadata encoding/decoding and form dialogs.
frontend/src/components/admin/panels/Cla: Handles clan creation, editing, deletion, and metadata processing with dialog-based forms.
frontend/src/components/admin/panels/Col: Displays collaboration requests, supports viewing detailed request data, and sorts entries by timestamp.
frontend/src/components/admin/panels/Epi: Provides full episode CRUD, reordering, metadata fields, and thumbnail upload/validation.
frontend/src/components/admin/panels/Fan: Shows fan mail messages, allows replying via dialog, and sorts messages by submission time.
frontend/src/components/admin/panels/Gal: Provides a full CRUD interface for gallery items, including file upload, metadata handling, and tagging characters or clans.
frontend/src/components/admin/panels/New: Manages news posts with create, edit, and delete dialogs using simple text fields.
frontend/src/components/admin/panels/Scr: Allows admins to create, edit, and delete scripts, handling authorization errors and basic text form inputs.
frontend/src/components/admin/panels/Sup: Displays supporter help requests in a sortable list with a detail dialog for viewing full messages.
frontend/src/components/admin/panels/Tea: Provides role management for team members, enabling admins to grant or revoke roles and add new principals.
frontend/src/components/affinity/Affinit: Displays a detailed affinity match card with character portrait, descriptions, and animated visual effects.
frontend/src/components/affinity/affinit: Initializes character scores and computes the highest‑matching character with a calculated soul resonance percentage.
Builds share text and provides clipboard and Web Share API utilities for sharing affinity results.
Defines character ID union types and interfaces for affinity scoring and match results.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Renders a login/logout button using Internet Identity status with loading and error handling.
frontend/src/components/characters/Chara: Displays a character card with portrait, clan styling, details, and motion‑aware animations.
frontend/src/components/characters/Creat: Provides a dialog form for creating new characters, including metadata encoding and mutation handling.
Shows a compact badge for a clan with accent color styling and optional motion effects.
frontend/src/components/clans/ClanCard.t: Displays a full clan card with sigil, badge, description, and animated visual effects.
frontend/src/components/common/GlowingGl: Simple wrapper component that renders children inside a styled glowing glass panel.
frontend/src/components/episodes/Episode: Renders episode information with status, summary, and an optional watch button.
Displays episode details in a dialog and plays a video if available, otherwise shows an unavailable alert.
frontend/src/components/gallery/ArtistLe: Renders a leaderboard of artists with ranks, badges, and a profile dialog trigger, handling loading and error states.
frontend/src/components/gallery/ArtistPr: Shows an artist’s profile with stats, badges, and artworks, including a lightbox viewer and loading fallback.
frontend/src/components/gallery/GalleryG: Displays gallery items in a responsive grid with optional category tabs and image click handling.
frontend/src/components/gallery/GalleryL: Provides a fullscreen lightbox for navigating images with keyboard support and optional admin deletion.
frontend/src/components/gallery/GalleryU: Implements a dialog for uploading gallery artwork with drag‑and‑drop, form fields, validation, and submission.
frontend/src/components/gallery/HallOfFa: Displays featured artist cards with artwork, achievements, and a lightbox viewer sourced from mock data.
frontend/src/components/news/NewPostForm: Provides a form for creating news posts with validation, error display, and submit handling.
frontend/src/components/news/NewsPostCar: Renders a news post with title, author, formatted timestamp, and content inside a styled panel.
Restricts access to Pro mode content based on authentication and admin status, redirecting unauthorized users.
frontend/src/components/pro/proPresentat: Encodes and decodes Pro presentation blocks to and from JSON with structure validation.
frontend/src/components/pro/ProPresentat: Loads, displays, and edits Pro presentation blocks with scroll reveal and Pro-mode editing controls.
frontend/src/components/pro/proPresentat: Zustand store managing Pro presentation blocks with add, update, remove, and initialization logic.
Defines TypeScript interfaces for Pro presentation blocks and documents.
frontend/src/components/pro/ProToolbar.t: Toolbar for adding blocks and saving Pro presentation updates, with save status and error handling.
frontend/src/components/quiz/quizScoring: Initializes clan scores and determines quiz results, including tie-breaking and a special balance outcome.
frontend/src/components/quiz/ResultsCard: Displays quiz results with clan styling, sigil, personality text, and optional secret badge.
Provides utilities to copy quiz results to clipboard and a placeholder for exporting results as images.
frontend/src/components/secrets/secretPr: Manages secret discovery progress in localStorage, providing load, save, update, and reset utilities.
frontend/src/components/secrets/SecretVa: React section displaying secret vault progress, unlocked lore, characters, and artwork with modal previews and reset support.
frontend/src/components/sections/AboutSe: Animated About section presenting story overview and feature cards with reveal-on-scroll effects.
frontend/src/components/sections/Charact: Interactive affinity quiz that updates character scores, computes match results, and provides sharing options.
Loads and displays character cards, supports admin character creation, and applies metadata decoding.
frontend/src/components/sections/ClanPer: Clan personality quiz that tracks answers, calculates a result, and allows copying quiz outcomes.
frontend/src/components/sections/ClansSe: Fetches clans, merges backend metadata with static styling, and displays animated clan cards with a fallback plus an embedded world map.
frontend/src/components/sections/Collabo: Provides a collaboration request form with validation, mutation submission, success feedback, and error handling.
frontend/src/components/sections/Contact: Renders the contact page with fan mail form, static contact info, and animated section reveal.
frontend/src/components/sections/Donatio: Displays themed donation tiers with animated reveal and stylized background imagery.
frontend/src/components/sections/Episode: Loads and decodes episodes, shows loading/error states, and opens a player dialog for released episodes.
frontend/src/components/sections/FanMail: Implements a fan mail submission form with validation, mutation handling, success messages, and error alerts.
Renders the footer with quick links, social icons, branding, and smooth-scroll behavior.
frontend/src/components/sections/Gallery: Fetches, filters, and displays gallery items with sorting, lightbox, uploads, and admin actions.
frontend/src/components/sections/HeaderN: Provides a responsive navigation bar with scroll behavior, smooth scrolling, mobile menu, and admin link.
frontend/src/components/sections/HeroSec: Displays the hero banner with parallax background, animated particles, and stylized title content.
frontend/src/components/sections/NewsUpd: Handles news fetching, admin post creation, user profile setup, and renders a scroll-reveal news feed.
frontend/src/components/sections/PowerSy: Displays a searchable database of power types, rules, forbidden techniques, and character abilities using tabs and animated sections.
frontend/src/components/sections/Support: Implements a validated support request form with mutation submission, success feedback, and error handling.
frontend/src/components/sections/WorldMa: Renders interactive SVG hotspots over a world map, handling clicks, keyboard events, and storing element refs.
Shows a dialog with lore for a selected map location and triggers secret unlocks based on specific regions.
Combines the world map image, hotspots overlay, and lore dialog with scroll animations and focus management.
frontend/src/data/affinityCharacters.ts: Defines affinity character metadata including personality, fighting style, story role, and portrait paths.
Defines interfaces and a list of affinity quiz questions with answer options mapped to character score weights.
frontend/src/data/characters.ts: Provides character definitions with clan, personality, powers, and roles for major story figures.
frontend/src/data/clanQuizQuestions.ts: Contains quiz questions for determining clan alignment, each with answers scoring various clans.
frontend/src/data/clanQuizResults.ts: Lists clan result profiles with personality descriptions, including a secret Balance Clan.
frontend/src/data/clans.ts: Defines clan metadata such as descriptions, colors, and sigil asset paths.
frontend/src/data/episodes.ts: Provides Season 1 episode metadata including titles, summaries, and release status.
frontend/src/data/gallery.ts: Declares gallery item structure and an empty gallery list with predefined categories.
frontend/src/data/powerSystemDatabase.ts: Describes power types, ability rules, forbidden techniques, and character ability data for the power system.
frontend/src/data/secretLore.ts: Defines interfaces and arrays for lore fragments, hidden character info, and bonus artwork used in the game's world-building data.
frontend/src/data/worldMapLocations.ts: Provides typed world map location data including coordinates, clan affiliations, lore text, and SVG hotspot shapes.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, refetching dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity authentication context, handling login, stored identities, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useParallax.ts: Offers a hook that applies parallax scrolling effects to an element unless reduced-motion preferences are enabled.
frontend/src/hooks/usePrefersReducedMoti: Detects the user's OS-level reduced‑motion preference using a media query.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Wraps backend API calls with React Query hooks for user profiles, admin checks, news, episodes, and other data.
frontend/src/hooks/useRevealOnScroll.ts: Provides a hook that reveals an element when scrolled into view using IntersectionObserver, respecting reduced‑motion settings.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets global Tailwind layers, OKLCH color variables, dark mode themes, fonts, and custom glow utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity provider and loads global CSS.
frontend/src/types/fanArtCommunity.ts: Defines TypeScript interfaces for artist leaderboards, profiles, artworks, and hall of fame entries.
Provides helpers to encode/decode metadata in text fields and retrieve clan styling defaults.
frontend/src/utils/galleryImageUpload.ts: Validates image uploads by type and size and converts them to data URLs.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL parameters with session persistence.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme extensions, color variables, container settings, and plugin integrations.
project_state.json: Describes the project's state, existing features, new feature requests, and version metadata.
